attributes.action: Stop accepting immigrants and make them fight for their country
attributes.background: The reason for this is we do not have the funds nor the economy to accept so many, over a quarter will start war, trouble and put our police force under strain. They need to fight for their country just as we will when isis arrive.

rejection.details:
It seems from your petition that you would like the UK Government to require immigrants to the UK from other countries to join the armed forces of their country of origin. The armed forces of other countries are not something that the UK Government or Parliament are responsible for. 

If you would like the UK to stop accepting immigrants, there is already a petition about this:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106477
